name: Tennisoid
description:
The game is a simple arcade, brick-buster mixed up with tennis theme.

Unlike other breakout clones sidewalls are placed at angle and second thing is that the player can move up, down, left and right, holding tennis racket at different angles to bounce ball in desired direction. Movement speed of the racket during bounce affects speed of ball. You can try to play faster balls but it makes game harder. Goal is to minimize overall ball in play time in all levels, which is displayed after beating last level.

There are 21 levels to beat. Each level contains unique bricks layout with complexity varying among them.

It takes about 30 - 40 minutes to beat whole game.
